meanings.definition: The state or quality of being impermeable.
meanings.sent1: The impermeabilities of the rubber gloves kept the water out.
meanings.sent2: The impermeabilities of the rock prevented water from seeping through.
meanings.sent3: The impermeabilities of the umbrella were tested by pouring water on it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a fortress, with impermeabilities to negative thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The impermeabilities of the dam were crucial in preventing flooding.

meanings.definition: The inability to be penetrated or passed through.
meanings.sent1: The impermeabilities of the wall stopped the ants from entering.
meanings.sent2: The impermeabilities of the plastic bag kept the food fresh.
meanings.sent3: The impermeabilities of the balloon made it impossible to blow up.
meanings.sent4: His heart had impermeabilities to deceit, always seeing the truth.
meanings.sent5: The impermeabilities of the shield protected the knight in battle.
